service1text: General Repairs, Electrical Repairs & Computer Diagnostics
service3text: Used and new car spare parts & accessories store
about-us-slogan: CAR SERVICE WILL TAKE CARE OF YOUR CAR
about-us-text: Car service ARTauto offers quality car repair and service in Rezekne. Car service staff repairs all brands of cars, regardless of the year of manufacture, as well as offers evacuation services in the event of an accident. We will detect defect of your vehicle and repair it as soon as possible with the necessary equipment and software, and our store will take care of the spare parts.
